source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a time-lapse of a massive cumulonimbus cloud, also known as a thunderhead. The top of the cloud is brilliantly lit by the sun, contrasting with its dark, shadowy base. The entire formation is set against a deep blue sky, looming over a dark horizon.
